pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
PROJECT: PFI Boiler Room
SHEET: S1
TITLE: ROOF FRAMING PLAN
CLIENT: Custom CAD Consulting Inc.
ENGINEER: Waddell Engineering
DATE: 2025-01-16
ISSUED FOR: Construction
PROJECT NO: 25-01-067
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES:
1. ALL STEEL TO BE ASTM A992.
2. ALL WELDING TO CONFORM TO AWS D1.1.
3. VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS ON SITE.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet primarily features a roof framing plan for the PFI Boiler Room, detailing the layout and dimensions of the roof structure. It includes an anchor plan and several sections illustrating specific structural connections. Key details such as typical column to beam connections and anchor bolt details are provided. The sheet is issued for construction and includes general notes on material specifications and welding standards.
